message.body: Reg, I'm so sorry to hear all of this. Good news is - things can only get better. You're not a mental case but you have been dealt a really shitty hand for the past year and you're trying to make sense of it. It's time to get a fresh start - maybe a new city? New job? Just keep pushing towards and fighting for the light. Are your friends and family supportive of you?
Bobs been being really cool cuz I've missed 3-4 weeks of work!! Need a weekend getaway nite hav to come c u!!
Bob is great. I'm glad he's being flexible and kind. Definitely come to Philly! I think I'll be home at the end of September too so we can go and drink some margs!
Just looks tickets r cheap to fly there whoo hoo!
I do work weekends though just so you know
That's what I thought!! Dunno bout getting time off Bob on my ass to be here
